mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(Subscription.subscription_id, 0) AS is_subscribed, Video.*, Channel.channel_name, Channel.channel_description , COALESCE(subscriber_cnt.subscriber_count, 0) as subscriber_count FROM Video INNER JOIN Channel ON Video.channel_id = Channel.channel_id LEFT JOIN Subscription ON Subscription.channel_id = Channel.channel_id AND Subscription.user_id = #{user_id} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT channel_id, COUNT(*) as subscriber_count FROM Subscription GROUP BY channel_id ) subscriber_cnt ON subscriber_cnt.channel_id = Channel.channel_id WHERE Channel.channel_id = #{channel_id};
